str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To throw away from, throw overboard, cast aside. From apo and ballo; to throw off; figuratively, to lose.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From pas and a derivative of rheo; all out-spokenness, i.e. Frankness, bluntness, publicity; by implication, assurance.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Feminine Singular
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
(lit: repayment of price or payment of price due), reward, due punishment. From misthapodotes; requital.
